data.lyric:
[ti:Suicidal (Explicit)]
[ar:YNW Melly]
[al:Melly vs. Melvin (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Suicidal (Explicit) - YNW Melly
[00:00.90]Suicidal
[00:03.68]Your love is suicidal
[00:06.42]Lately I've been feeling suicidal
[00:10.50]Your love is suicidal
[00:13.53]I thought that we were meant to be
[00:16.91]You took my heart and made it bleed
[00:20.18]I gave you all my ecstasy
[00:23.64]I know you'll be the death of me
[00:27.02]Left lipstick on my Hennessy
[00:30.44]Felt like you took my soul from me
[00:33.85]You gave me all your ecstasy
[00:37.33]I thought that we were meant to be
[00:41.13]Your love is suicidal
[00:44.52]For me your love is suicidal
[00:47.90]To me your love is suicidal
[00:51.28]To me your love is suicidal
[00:53.69]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[00:57.22]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[01:01.80]I don't want to lose my conscience
[01:06.84]Drinkin' all this Hennessy
[01:10.37]Baby you took control of me
[01:13.37]And I got too many enemies
[01:16.94]I knew you wanted to f**k him 'cause I could just tell
[01:21.86]Check my back now I'm now I'm in my bag yeah
[01:25.08]You did me bad you did me bad
[01:28.53]But I said f**k it and I ran up my bag yeah
[01:32.09]I'm in my bag I'm in my bag now
[01:35.76]But you didn't even put it all on the line
[01:39.38]For me no oh I'm sorry
[01:43.93]This is the end of us
[01:45.92]It's crazy 'cause my heart is dangerous
[01:50.26]Felt like you took my soul from me
[01:53.60]Like the devil got a hold on me
[01:57.02]Everybody wishin' bad on me
[02:00.48]Everybody wishin' bad on me
[02:03.81]You taught a lesson to me that I had to learn
[02:07.11]And I'm so sorry 'cause you let our bridges burn
[02:10.48]I said I loved you and I wish I never did
[02:13.90]I swear to God I swear to God you stupid b***h
[02:16.73]I thought that we were meant to be
[02:20.33]You took my heart and made it bleed
[02:23.75]I gave you all my ecstasy
[02:27.07]I know you'll be the death of me
[02:30.46]Left lipstick on my Hennessy
[02:33.89]Felt like you took my soul from me
[02:36.83]No way I gave you all my ecstasy
[02:40.77]I thought that you were meant for me
[02:44.13]I know you'll be the death of me
[02:47.61]Thought we were for eternity
[02:50.97]You f**ked me up both physically
[02:54.38]And mentally I can't believe
[02:57.39]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[03:00.75]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[03:04.18]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[03:07.62]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[03:12.24]Your love is suicidal
[03:15.28]For me your love is suicidal
[03:18.62]To me your love is suicidal
[03:22.04]To me your love is suicidal
[03:26.08]You taught a lesson to me that I had to learn
[03:29.40]And I'm so sorry 'cause you let our bridges burn
[03:32.89]I said I loved you and I wish I never did
[03:36.27]I swear to God I swear to God you stupid b***h
data.trans:
[ti:Suicidal (Explicit)]
[ar:YNW Melly]
[al:Melly vs. Melvin (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.90]生不如死
[00:03.68]你的爱让我生不如死
[00:06.42]最近我总是痛不欲生
[00:10.50]你的爱让我生不如死
[00:13.53]我以为我们是命中注定
[00:16.91]你带走了我的心 可你让我遍体鳞伤
[00:20.18]我为你神魂颠倒
[00:23.64]我知道你让我自取灭亡
[00:27.02]酒里残留着你唇齿间的气息
[00:30.44]我觉得你牢牢地握住了我的心
[00:33.85]你曾为我着迷
[00:37.33]我以为我们是命中注定
[00:41.13]你的爱让我生不如死
[00:44.52]于我而言 你的爱让我生不如死
[00:47.90]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[00:51.28]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[00:53.69]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[00:57.22]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[01:01.80]我不想失去理智
[01:06.84]将轩尼诗红酒一饮而尽
[01:10.37]宝贝 你掌控了我的心
[01:13.37]我有许多情敌
[01:16.94]我知道你想和别人缠绵 我心知肚明
[01:21.86]审视自己 如今我已不再爱你
[01:25.08]你不停地埋怨我
[01:28.53]我说放下过去 我已热情尽失
[01:32.09]如今我为自己而活
[01:35.76]可你从未对我说过真心话
[01:39.38]于我而言 我很抱歉
[01:43.93]我们形同陌路
[01:45.92]真是疯狂 因为我的心犹豫不决
[01:50.26]我觉得你牢牢地握住了我的心
[01:53.60]像恶魔一样抓住我
[01:57.02]每个人都希望我一蹶不振
[02:00.48]每个人都希望我一蹶不振
[02:03.81]你给了我一个教训 我必须时刻铭记
[02:07.11]我很抱歉 因为你让我们无法回头
[02:10.48]我曾说我爱你 可我悔不当初
[02:13.90]我对上帝发誓 你不知好歹
[02:16.73]我以为我们是命中注定
[02:20.33]你带走了我的心 可你让我遍体鳞伤
[02:23.75]我为你神魂颠倒
[02:27.07]我知道你让我自取灭亡
[02:30.46]酒里残留着你唇齿间的气息
[02:33.89]我觉得你牢牢地握住了我的心
[02:36.83]没门 我为你神魂颠倒
[02:40.77]我以为我们是天作之合
[02:44.13]我知道你让我自取灭亡
[02:47.61]我以为我们会天长地久
[02:50.97]你让我身心俱疲
[02:54.38]我简直不敢相信
[02:57.39]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[03:00.75]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[03:04.18]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[03:07.62]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[03:12.24]你的爱让我生不如死
[03:15.28]于我而言 你的爱让我生不如死
[03:18.62]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[03:22.04]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[03:26.08]你给了我一个教训 我必须时刻铭记
[03:29.40]我很抱歉 因为你让我们无法回头
[03:32.89]我曾说我爱你 可我悔不当初
[03:36.27]我对上帝发誓 你不知好歹
